about_the_game:
Tiny Tales is designed for those who want to create a cutesy yet epic adventure scenario for their game. In TT Heroes: Rebellious Souls, you will find 8 unique and expertly crafted heroes for your game!

A band of misfits fight against the odds, and unite to save a world that chose to forsake them. With this pack, you will have all the necessary tools to bring unique heroes to life in your game! Portraits, Side View Battlers, Static Battlers and Map Sprites, all included to start an epic journey!

Features:

- 8 Unique Heroes: Female Dark Elf, Male Dark Elf, Amazon Barbarian, Tiefling Strider, Warforged, Female Orc, Dragonian Sorcerer and Kitsune Miko!
- SV Battlers and Static Enemy versions of the heroes!
- Beautiful portraits with expression sets, both in big bust version and faceset version!
- Charset Versions of the heroes!
- Various convenient resizes (2x and 3x) to fit with different resolutions!
- (Bonus!) 12 Starting Weapons for SV Battlers!

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
